snippet: GRANT--Jacqueline Ross, a lifelong New Yorker, died 22 March in Boulder, CO. Beloved wife of 66 years of William, loving mother of Jenifer and David. Eternally vigilant and a champion of women's rights and public education, she was Chair of Community School Board 28, Queens and Assistant VP at Citibank. Donations to rettsyndrome.org 1/3
lead_paragraph: GRANT--Jacqueline Ross, a lifelong New Yorker, died 22 March in Boulder, CO. Beloved wife of 66 years of William, loving mother of Jenifer and David. Eternally vigilant and a champion of women's rights and public education, she was Chair of Community School Board 28, Queens and Assistant VP at Citibank. Donations to rettsyndrome.org 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GRANT, JACQUELINE ROSS
